#define ENTRYTC ( _l_,
_n_,
_f_   ) 

Value:

do {                                                            \
        TestCaseInfoTC* tc = (TestCaseInfoTC*)malloc(sizeof(TestCaseInfoTC));\
        if( tc == NULL ) break;                                         \
        STRCPY(tc->name_,_n_,MaxTestCaseName);                          \
        tc->test_ = _f_;                                                \
        tc->id_   = dl_list_size(_l_)+1;                                \
        dl_list_add( _l_, (void*)tc );                                  \
        } while(0)
Macro that makes adding test cases easier.
Parameters:
_l_ pointer to list on which new test case will be stored
_n_ is the name of the test case
_f_ is the name of test function
